column1: I try the revitalift challenge fot 14 days samples and is perfect for my face skin. I wan the normal size [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
My skin started to look healthier with each application and at 51 I want to have beautiful skin. I am hooked on L'Oreal products. <3 [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received the 14 day challenge from Loreal RevitaLift Triple Power lifting moisturizer. I seen a difference in my skin from the second day. Wrinkles have softened and my skin tone has improved. So far I really like this moisturizer. I'm only on day 3, so I will do another review later. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

14 days ago I started the challenge of revelitf and I have noticed some positive changes in my face, my skin looks soft and fresh and my face also looks more relaxed.The results of the moisturizer are excellent but I would like to feel a more comfortable feeling when applying it [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I just purchased this moisturizer and after I applied it I noticed some flakes on my blouse and hands. When I looked into the mirror my face look as if it was peeling. Is this a normal reaction? I used a small amount and massaged it in but im not sure if I will continue to use this product.

Literally bought this product three weeks ago. I am beyond impressed! I saw a drastic change in my skin, and I could not be happier. Changes included firmer younger looking skin, reduction of wrinkles and fine lines, and dark spots are demishing as well. Could kick myself for not purchasing sooner!

I tried the 14 day #revitaliftchallenge and was amazed at the results. My skin was more hydated and my face clearly showed reduced fine lines and wrinkles. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I was not used to cold weathers, and since the weather here in the us got colder and colder each day, my skin got dry as it has never been before. And so I was really excited to start my revitalift challenge. I've seen results in just a matter of days. My face became firmer and smoother. Although I didn't like the super strong smell, and it felt a little greasy during application. But definitely does the job! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I bought this product on 11-03-2017, because I couldn't wait for the samples... I've been using it daily twice a day... It totally works I am 57 yrs young expecting my first grandbaby... This photo is a week old I have notice the fine lines, crows feets around my eyes softer.... This is my new best friend... I will continue using this product.... Thank you Loreal Paris.. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received the Revitalift Triple Power anti-aging moisturizer so I could write a review. I was hesitant because my skin doesn't adjust well to different products. I really look younger after using this! I love it. I usually buy an anti-moisturizer from a very expensive company, but I believe I will change to L'oreal! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I was very leery of the challenge considering I would never use a product on my face for fear of breakouts, clogged pores and greasiness, but this product did not do that. I can't tell you how excited I am to buy this product because not only did it perform better than I ever expected, but delivered beautiful results. My face feels and looks incredible. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

RevitaLift smelled amazing. It was light and creamy when applying. Smoothly spreading and easy to guide. The moisturizing cream felt weightless on my face and not noticable. Used at bedtime it wasnt irrating while I slept. When dried my face felt soft. Washed off with no after grease. Gave a overall younger look to my complexion and made me feel younger to. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I was part of the Loriell challenge for 14 days. I was skeptical at first because I have very deep lines between my eyes. But even my husband after the fifth day of using Loriell cream said he noticed a difference in my skin and didn't know what it was. I absolutely love this Product. I do believe that it is worth investing in and will be buying some in the future. Thank you Loriell for allowing me to be a part of an awesome trial. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

i love this product as an asian my skin face is soft and i didnt get pimples mostly if i use moisturizer i get pimples but this product i love it im gonna buy again and its not sticky to your face one reason why i like [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Day 14 of 14 of my #RevitaliftChallenge. Thanks #loreal for my free trial to test the product, REVITALIFT Triple Power. I loved this product. Definitely, lifted my skin and left my face feeling silky smooth. #lorealparis [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received a 14 day sample of this moisturizer, It's been 11 days and I can see a boost in my skin's radiance. Also this cream has provided an even tone and soft skin. I wasn't using this for any Anti-aging properties, but it definitely gave me a nicely moisturized skin. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

My fourteen day experience was started with the delightful smell of the cream and the good texture upon smoothing it on my skin. It hydrated my dry skin immensely, and felt wonderfly thick and sumptuous. I could feel my skin soaking it up as I applied it! The next morning my skin was supple and moist. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I took the 14 day challenge and my skin is 100 percent better! The wrinkles on my neck aren't nearly as noticeable as they were before and my skin is so moist and feels great. I already bought a jar so I can continue RevitaLift in my day and night regime. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I was send the RevitaLift Triple power samples for 14 day challenge and I absolutely loved this moisturizer .I found the cream to be intensely moisturizer and quickly absorbed into the skin.The powerful ingredients makes this super effective.I could definitely see mu skin change within first 4 days.I loved this product!

I tried this for 14 days and did not see any difference in my face and neck. I thought it had a "heavy" or thick feeling but it did go on smoothly. I love your "Eye Defense" for around my eyes and mouth but I was not impressed with this cream as I did not see a big difference from what I used before. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Here are my before Revitalift Challenge on left and after picture on right. Noticable difference!! Worked on the wrinkles around my mouth and eyes. At 55, I am watching the aging wrinkles lessen with this product. I think it's wonderful and would recommend it highly! Thank you for the sample! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

FREE L'Oreal Revitalift Triple Power Moisturizer 14 Day Sample of Triple Power does do a great job tightening up face skin feeling and looking smoother. Don't use it to under your dry nose. L'Oreal Paris Revitalift Triple Power will burn and feels like it is on fire ! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this complimentary for my honest review and I must say I love this stuff. It I should a bit thick and creamy but it soaks into your skin so well and it moisturizers and hydrates your skin immediately. I have sensitively skin and didn't have any issues with this. The smell is an amazing bonus! It smells so good. I would definitely recommend this product! I did the 14 day challenge and I am hooked. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

By the 4th day of using the product, I noticed the tightness n my cheeks becoming less and less. Applying the cream was very easy. It went on smooth and absorbed quickly. My skin feels great and has a more youthful appearance. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Absolutely loved this product! Fragrance was wonderful and it went onto my skin smoothly. Not oily and hydrated my skin completly. I actually think it firmed up the skin around my eyes. Which was beginning to be a problem area. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I'm always funny about the products I use on my face due to oily skin, but I tried this and after it dried it was perfect!! No oily feeling at all. After the two weeks I really noticed my skin tighter, pink and had a nice glow to it. I would definitely recommend this to anyone that just needs a little life to their face. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I took the 14 day challenge! At first I didn't think I was going to like it because it is thicker then what I'm used to. But, after 14 days I definitely noticed a difference. My face is smoother, softer and those pesky crows feet are diminishing! It doesn't make my face feel oily either! New must have in my beauty regimen! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

After I used up my samples, I ran right out and bought a new bottle. I loved the way my face felt and looked. Seemed to me I had less wrinkles. I loved it when I got asked by someone my age, I said 53 but the role me, I did not look a day over 45! What a smile I had on my face! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received a 12 day supply of RevitalLift from L'OREAL to try and give my honest feedback on. This stuff is great and I could see a difference after 3 treatments. My skin looked firmer, the fine lines and wrinkles were not as pronounced as before. I am a firm believer in RevitalLift and will be purchasing my first bottle. I give them a big shout out. Highly recommend. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
This is day 2 of my 14 day challenge.

So the product has a nice smooth feel with a very subtle floral smell not overwhelming. The product goes on smoothly and had a slight burn but I had no redness or hives. I can see a slight improvement but I'm looking forward to the 14thday I'm optimistic I think the results will be significant. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Thank you L'Oreal for a excellent anti- ageing product. I loved this sample the moment I tore it open and applied it to my face. It definitely revived my dry dull skin. After a week I noticed a remarkable difference. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This product is absolutely amazing, it does what it says it will . It has a rich creamy texture and it melts into your skin like butter, it smells amazing too. I recommend everyone should try Revitalift ,this will be another holy grail for my skincare [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I was fortunate enough to get a free sample of RevitaLift. It's extremely lightweight, your skin feels like I can breathe after you apply it. My skin absorbs it immediately without any greasy residue. Within two weeks I've seen a difference with the fine lines on my face. I also like that as a very subtle sense that's not overpowering. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this free and I have to say I loved everything about my face feels and looks amazing. Love how it doesn't make my face oily , the hydration and moisturizer is incredible my 14- day challenge was a success [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I've been using this for 14 days now and I absolutely love it! It goes on well under my makeup and doesn't make my face oily at all. I can also feel it working when I put it on after getting out of the shower in the morning. Very satisfied with this new product! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received a sample from L'Oreal for the #RevitaLiftChallenge & I'm in love! I'm 38 years old & wanted to try something to keep a youthful glow & look. This is it. My skin felt instantly hydrated & firm. I use it morning & night. It's a must have & a perfect addition to your beauty routine. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have been doing this L'Oréal Revitalift Challenge for about a week now and I can a little difference on my face . I can see how my skin look healthier , and as far as lines I still see some lines under my eyes . But I still have time. But I love how the texture of the moisturizer is it really feels like it's really hydrating my face I do love that!! Thank you L'Oréal for let me do this Challenge and for sending me the free 14 day complimentary pack to try out!! That was awesome!!! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I took the Revitalift challenge and I'm so pleased! My skin is smoother, more youthful and overall feels better. I would highly recommend L'oreal Rivitalift to my friends and family. Love the skin within! Thank you. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I been using it about 3 days now and I already see and feel the difference it's smooth not greasy and absorbs great in to the skin soft to the touch I live in las. Vegas Nevada and the weather is always dry here and iv tryed many diffrant brand this one works awsome everyone give it a try [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I bought thoroduct about 3 weeks ago and and my friends and family said they can see a difference in my appearance and it is a God difference. I love it! I use the face scrub every morning then apply the credit and my skin feels silky soft and I can see an improvement in my facal skin. I am going to buy the night mask next bc I think that it will work just as well as the day cream! Thanks loreal!

I've been using L'oreal anti aging day and night moisturizer and my 69 year face has barely any wrinkles. Love this product over 25 or more,lost count, of using your products. I also use the hair coloring products. I just tried age perfect hair coloring and have recommended to friends. Love all your products.

My daughter gave me a small container of this so i thought ok another cream she wants me to try. So I said to myself ill try on one side for a week .needless to say when i saw after a week i went and bought the larger container now trying to even out.by the way im 72 thank you for this product it does work

One of the best I've ever used. And I've used the expense stuff before, but the results weren't noticeable . I also use the overnight intensive mask , the results are incredible. I would recommend this product to anyone wanting to reduce wrinkles, firm skin and brighten you complexion. I will never use anything else. Love it!

I really like this moisturizer! I received it complimentary from @influenster! I have combination skin which leans more on the dry side most times & this really gave me the moisture I look for in a cream. My only concern would be I feel that it lays on the skin a bit and doesn't soak completely in. Other than that, great product! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I have tried many face products to no avail After a month and a half I have actually seen a reduction in the fine wrinkles on my face and neck. Will continue to use it daily.

After I apply it, it rolls off my face. It can not possibly be part of the process wearing the moisturizer. This ends up causing me to appear to have dandruff on my face. I was concerned the product was old or defective till I saw other reviews & comments.
I received a 14 day trial of REVITALIFT®
Triple Power™ Intensive Anti-Aging Day Cream Moisturizer. Great product! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Just received and started samples. Love the refreshing glow. Only on day five but I swear that I feel difference already. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Loreal sent me samples to try for 14days,after 2 days of applying it I already noticed my face became smoother.This product is really amazing. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I took the 14-day challenge and must admit I see better results than from my regular skin care product. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Hello,
I got the 14 pack sample of loreal anti aging moisturizer. I found this cream to be less moisturizing to my skin. I have dry skin. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I'm on day 3 of the 14 day challenge and i am noticing a difference in the appearance of lines and wrinkles around eyes and forehead. I am so excited to see the final results! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
This product is awesome and is interchangeable with other L'Oréal products, it calmed and hydrated the lines on my forehead [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I completed the Revitalft Triple Power challenge and my skin looks very soft and smooth. It looked like I was wearing foundation! This is an awesome moisturizer!! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Have been using Revitalift for 7 days. The texture of my skin has improved and my pores are smaller. Don't like selfies, but my skin looks great for 66 years old.

Never used it before until I received the samples. I love how it feels on my face. Most products burn my eyes. But this is so gentle. I will be buying this product... [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

finally something I don't want to wash off as soon as I put it on. I am using the Dr. Dennis Gross LED light eye mask along with my revitalift triple power and I am seeing a difference [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
i tried the samples sent to me and I am somewhat happy with the results.
It did not really do much for my wrinkles but made my skin appear brighter and smoother. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
The RevitaLift made my skin feel wonderful. Very little product goes a long way. It's not too heavy, and it has a pleasant smell. Amazing! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I really like it. I did notice a change it was a little gradual change nothing drastic but my skin looks and feels amazing. Thank you for the opportunity. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I had a sample for the 14 day challenge for revitalift and im loving it. Im at day 9 right now and i can already see and feel the difference. My skin is moistutized, less fine lines and wrinkles. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I received my 14 day samples and after 4 days I noticed a positive change in my skin. I love how weightless it feels [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I gave my samples to my mom and she said she loved it. She was so excited to try and loved it so much she went out and bought it. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I'm on day 8 and couldn't be happier with the results. I received a 14 day trial and when I'm done, I will definitely be purchasing my own bottle of the RevitalLift moisturizer.
I got a free 28 day sample I'm on day 8 it's amazing it makes my skin feel so smooth my face looks incredible I don't look as tired [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I took the 14 day challenge and am amazed at the results. My face is softer and the fine lines are less visible. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
This is the best moistizier I have ever used and it helped with my wrinkles and my face feels smooth. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I doing the 14 day challenge and i'm on day 5 and i see a lot of wrinkles gone i'm really amazed with this product i give it 5 stars [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this product from Influenster to review and I really liked it. It's was not too heavy and worked great for my oily skin. Absorbs fast and felt great on the skin. The smell was very light and not overbearing. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

L'Oréal Paris RevitaLift® Triple Power™ Intensive Anti-Aging Day Cream Moisturizer I received the VoxBox via the influenster program. The products were completely FREE with being part of the influenster program. Inthought I would not get in, but after so far using it for 2 days I'm already noticing my skin feels different. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this a few weeks ago, and started using it every day along with the rest of the skin care line.. and let me just tell you. This stuff really works! I look years younger and my skin feels super smooth! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have just started using moisturizers in my skin care routine, bc as I've gotten older, I've noticed a lot of dry patches on my face. When I saw that this was also an anti aging moisturizer, I was even more excited to try it. So far, So good. I haven't quite noticed any anti aging aspects yet, but the moisturizer does absorb really well. It is not too thick or too thin. I like a good consistency in my moisturizers. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

My husband accidentally purchased another brand, so, used that one up before I purchased my Revitalift again. Noticed the difference almost overnight. Happy to have my Revitalift again, the lines and wrinkles are a lot less prominent than before. My skin is happy again

I have tried so many face creams to reduce wrinkles on my face. Have heard good things about L'OREAL products I decided to give the REVITALIFT MOISTERIZER a try. The result was no change or improvement to my wrinkles. Very disappointed.
Feels great going on but won't absorb into my skin. Even after 30 mins, it balls up and flakes off my skin. I've never had this issue before. Will not purchase again.

I love this product! It has become my go to moisturizer! Sensitive skin runs in my family so I'm always careful when getting new products. When my skin became dry in the cold winter months my face would appear flakey, especially if I were to use makeup. After using this product my skin become smoother and felt hydrated. After a few days of use my skin completely lost that flakey texture and looked healthier and more radiant. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I bought this about a month ago and absolutely love it! I am 41 years old and really care aboit my skin! You can feel and see the difference in my face. My face is softer, and tighter. It has helped my bags under my eyes and feel so blessed to have found this!

I never use day cream because of how heavy it feels on my face (and i have tried many different brands and some were very expensive), Until i tried the Loreal Intensive Anit-Aging day Cream.... this cream is hands down the best - does not leave my face feeling oily, heaving and when i put on my foundation it does not feel like i have 10 layers on. it hydrates my face without the feeling of face cream.

I bought this cream recently after realizing the importance of a good moisturizer. My skin immediately felt softer and looked brighter. Plus it smells great. Overall I think it's a great price for a quality product and I'm excited to see the changes in my skin in the next few weeks. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This product is light weight and odorless. I use it after the serum and don't feel like it cakes up at all. It's a nice combination. My skin looks fresh and tight. I like that I can actually see a difference. I swear my skin looks more youthful. I would definitely recommend this product. The only reason I gave it four stars is because my skin is a little sensitive and I got a few pimples. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Not my absolute favorite but definitely has some great qualities about it , the formula is non greasy , penetrating, provides light moisture to the skin . I think the formula should be a little thicker for more hydration and a scent like the spf lotion would be great and a larger container being that this product is a moisturizer. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I saw a big difference, my skin became much smoother , Softer and brighter. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Wonderful product, I would say it's one of the best face products around [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Got a free sample and im pleased with the results. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I was happy with the results of the REVITALUFT. TRIPLE POWER. My skin feels firm. My slin feels smooth and nourished. My skin looks Alive.
loved ,the way it made my face look and feel plumped up my wrinkles and face felt more taught. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Completed the 12 day challenge....amazing results! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I used this like 1 week ago..and you cansee the effect. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I used this product for the entire two week trial and LOVED it! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I love the cream makes face feeling soft and I hope it's making a difference. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I have combination oily/dry skin. I haven't used it long enough to see major results. I will say this stuff is still pretty amazing. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
This makes my skin feel so very soft and hydrated as I have very dry! It also helps reduce fine lines !

I love this cream! I've only been using it once a day for three weeks. Other people were saying how good my skin looks! I was surprised about how well and fast this cream works! Very happy with the product! I would definitely recommend!
I just started using the brightening peel pads,absolutely amazing
I really love this Revitalift Day Cream. It's so light, doesn't leave any shine or oily feel to my skin. It wears great under make-up and hydrates all day!
I bought this last month and have been using it daily. Love how it feels so great and cool on my face. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I don't know why, but every time I put this on, I end up rubbing it off. It keeps balling up. I only use it at night because of this. I guess they need to improve the formulation a bit. Other than that, it smells nice and does moisturize.

This lovely moisturizer works well after cleansing my face, and I massage it in...but after I apply it, it rolls off my face when I apply makeup base, as if it is part of the process of wearing the moisturizer. This ends up causing me to appear to have a skin condition or dandruff when, in truth, I only have plain dry skin. LOVE the product! But is this reaction normal? Thanks for any tips.

All the pictures and great reviews show young..40..50 year old women..how about being real and show older women...if you start showing older women with honest results more people would buy your product..there is no product that shows that.. you don't even have a hair color for gray in your review..

I literally just bought this hours ago. I used it and it felt nice on my skin, but when I rubbed my face, it felt like my skin was balling up and peeling off. Not such a good claim as to the products performance at this moment. I will give it the 2 week test, pretty sure I'm going to want my money back. Here's hoping I don't!

I am sorry to say I couldn't finish testing the product so don't really know how good it is. I couldn't get past the smell. Not that it was bad just overpowering. All I could smell all day was the face cream. I have sensitive smell due to sinus issues and could only use it a couple of times. Does it come in a fragrance free product? I would be happy to sample that. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this as a sample and it was so great! I have bought since the samples ran out & never forget to apply it! It goes on easily & so smooth and afterwards my face feels amazing and my skin looks beautiful. This is definitely my have to have product! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have used and still do use many L'Oreal products, however this moisturizer does not absorb into the skin. I have tried using the serum before hand, I have tried using this moisturizer alone, and the product just crumbles on top of my skin. It is very unsightly and I need to completely tissue it off before

I really wanted to like this product but I find that when I apply the Revitalift, the product “balls” up as I try to apply my makeup over it which I then have to slough off my face. I like other L'Oréal products but this one doesn't work for me. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I recently took the Revitalift 21 day challenge. I was currently using Murad. I found Revitalift to be very comparable to Murad. My skin still looks and feels great! I will definitely purchase Revitalift in the future! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received my free samples 10 days ago and loved it from day 1! My skin immediately looked fresher and younger. It is just thick enough to last all day. After day 2, I was sold, and had to buy a jar before my sample ran out. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I tried the challenge and it works well. Made my skin feel soft and hydrated. Also helped with some fine lines and discoloration. The only thing I didn't like was the product would leave a residue and almost clump on my skin after some time. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I had a free trial of this moisturizer and after it was over, i can only say it made my skin moisturized better than it normally is. The fine lines and blemishes are still noticeable, and it burned for a little while on the skin. I don't think it can be good for my skin if it burns, and honestly wouldn't recommend it to anyone because of that, and the fact that my skin is the same after using it. Thanks, anyway for the sample, L'oreal! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I bought this today very excited from the reviews I read...only to be very disappointed... It is too heavy and actually feels like it's weighing my skin down and the fragrance is very strong!! I usually buy expensive skin care products however I just found a drug store foundation that I just love!! So when looking for a new firming foundation I was hopeful this product would be great as well. Not the case at all... I usually don't write reviews but had to with this one. DON'T BUY!!

Wow! This product is outstanding. I love the softness of my face after I apply the Loreal Revitalift intensive moisturizer. The moisturizer has a great scent and it feels very silky when applying it. I used the moisturizer for fourteen days and I was very happy with how my face looked brighter and no longer had dry flaky skin.
#free sample Loreal hip2save [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I tried the fourteen day trial that I got in the mail. After two weeks I didn't notice a marked difference in my wrinkles but I did have much smoother, softer skin.
I will continue to use and check results at a later date. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Just finished the 14 day trial. i really wanted to like this product, but I just didn't see any difference at all. It did absorb well and the smell was pleasant.
But, unfortunately, I did not see any difference with lines or texture. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I recieved a 14 day supply to test and review. I've tried many anti aging creams in the past and decided nothing works. This really does. I felt and saw a big difference. Even though I'm 62 years old, I've stayed out of the sun and really have very few wrinkles. But in the past couple of years. Fine lines around my mouth and eyes have appeared. Loreal has shown me a cream that smooths out the lines making them almost invisible. Thank you L'oreal. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Sorry, but in my honest opinion the strong perfume smell of this product was really overwhelming. I would have really loved to use it since I've used their creams before and enjoyed them but not this one. My face smelled so strong for the entire day and I had to eventually just wash it off. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I got a 7 day sample at work. My skin is very sensitive. Depending on what I've tryed, I either had breakouts, scaling, or for the first 30 min it feels like I need to rip my skin off. If I don't put anything on at all, my skin burns, starts flaking and I get red spots. With this cream- nothing!!!! First it felt funny to me and I can feel the moisturizer for about 10 min after I put it on my skin but this cream is great! No breakouts, scaling, itching or burning!!! I am thinking about trying the intense eye cream as well. Thank you L'Oréal!!
#revitalift #complimentary @Influenster @lorealskin . My skin is so soft. I use it day and night. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I love the consistency and feel! Super hydrating and smooth! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Felt good going on, then balled up and flaked off. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I just received this and have been using for 4 days. I don't care for the product at all because it rolls up on my skin like little balls. WHY??? I will not be purchasing.
Got this as a sample in a magazine and had to have it. Smells wonderful and has my skin looking and smelling amazing! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Received 5 one-use samples and I prefer using skincare for a minimum of 10 days (preferably 14) before reviewing. As soon as I applied it to my face, I noticed how creamy it was and sliky. I received Revitalift Triple Power Deep-Acting Moisturizer a couple of weeks ago. I was skeptical, but after using this twice daily, I can definately tell a difference in the wrinkles around my eyes, forehead, and around my lips. In the winter, My skin on my face is so dry and cracked. Using make up everyday only makes the situation worse. My face is so tight and itchy during the winter, It's just down right uncomfortable. I wasas shocked to receive a huge beautiful jar of revitalift in the mail shortly after new years day 1/2/13. I was out of all my products. Although I do like the consistancy of the cream and the way it goes on....it has done nothing in reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles on MY face. I use this product morning and nite. You only need a small amount and it makes you feel like you have done something very important for your skin. I have been using just over a month and I do see a visible differnce in my skin's texture and appearance.

WOW!!! Really pleased with the NEW L'OREAL PARIS Triple Action, Triple Results, Triple Power deep-acting moisturizer. The lines around my mouth have smoothed out and the skin is more supple. The scent is lovely! Thank you for this fabulous product and will continue to purchase this in the future..

I really didn't expect much, but I was really very pleasantly surprised. I used some on my eyelids, and they tightened up and "lifted" making me look younger. Thanks. Can't afford plastic surgery, and I'm so glad to find this works for me. No irritation of the skin either.

I adore this product, it genuinely worked over night on my under eye bags and my skin felt so firm! This is a must-have for me and I will be repurchasing time and time again.

I so enjoyed using Revitalift Triple Power Moisturizer. It was so silky smooth to the touch. I liked how it made my skin so soft but not oily feeling. My skin stayed soft all day!!! I have been having problems with dry patches on my face. I have been trying everything. Well,it is winter here in Maine and I deffinately needed a better moisturizer! I used my 5 day free trial cream and loved it. Now I have 2 jars of cream. I don't want to be without it, it works great. I can already see the difference in my skin. A few weeks ago I received a sample of RevitaLift. I've used it every day since then and there is a noticable improvement in my complextion. My skin is tighter and smoother. Now I know not all moisturizers are the same and I will only buy RevitaLift in the future.

I really like the RevitaLift Triple Power Deep-Acting Moisturizer and will be purchasing it. It seems to be making my aging skin a little firmer and I love the scent! And it feels good on my sensitive skin. A little goes a long way, too. Thank you for making such a wonderful product.

I received samples and tried them for the last week. Living in upstate New York in the winter moisturizer is a necessary staple. Loreal is not heavy, stickey or gummy like most. I can put this on in the morning and have soft, delicate skin all day. I have found my forever moisturizer . I should have known another Loreal product I have fallen in love with.

I also tend to suffer from redness/ruddiness during the dry, colder months and haven't since using this product. My skin has never felt softer.

I received samples of this in the mail and have been using it for about two weeks and love it! I have always taken really good care of my skin and tried alot of different products.
